about_the_game:
A hidden dream, undisclosed desires.

Adventure game for a secret relationship between celebrities!

"On the Q.T.", a text ADV distributed through the iOS/Andoroid app game "My Lovey:Choose your otome story", is now available on Steam.

●Notes.

・This work is identical in content to "On the Q.T." distributed through the "My Lovey:Choose your otome story" iOS/Android app.

・This game is based on the app version, so it will be displayed in portrait resolution.

・There are no in-game fees.

●Game System

　As you read the story, choices will appear.

　Depending on the choice you make, the story will change.

　Card illustrations can be obtained according to the number of times you play the game.

　A gallery mode is also available to view card illustrations and stills from the app version of the game.

●Story

The protagonist, Ema was a member of "Lu-ce.", an eight-person idol group that was popular for its perfectly synchronized dancing.

She was in a mid-life crisis, losing sight of her dreams. Her will to continue in show business had all but disappeared. However, a fateful encounter with the popular idol group "Un:Finish" changes her life in a way she never thought possible.

●Character

Hibiki Amagawa

“I don't mind people who are tone-deaf, but I loathe people who slack off during songs.”

　　19 years old. He's got the best vocals in the group, and his voice has enchanted many of his fans.

　　While he usually appears quite calm, his expressions become animated, and he expresses his feelings honestly when it comes to singing.

Keima Shimazaki

“I give my everything to the fans. Seeing them happy, makes me happy.”

　　23 years old. He's the most popular member in the group.

　　Diligent and hard-working, he's always putting his fans first. He acts as a leader in the group.

Akira Itonaga

“Why do I have to act nice towards the cast and the staff? It's not like I get anything out of it.”

　　20 years old. Blunt and unfriendly, yet his dance skills are rivaled by none.

　　He's extremely cautious of his surroundings.

　　He acts cold towards women, and always interacts with them with an invisible barrier between them.

Ema(*Name can be changed.)

“I don't care if my heart stops. I won't let them hear me breathe.”

　　She takes joy in singing. She's been dreaming of becoming a singer ever since childhood. 　　Three years have passed since her debut, and she is known among her fans for her ice-cold attitude.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64bit)
  • Processor: The 2st generation Intel® Core™ processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD2500/4000 Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Lu-ce., to which Ema belongs, is an eight-member idol unit that sells their well-rounded dance moves. Ema has now lost her goals and her motivation to perform in the entertainment industry, but her life changes drastically when she meets the popular idol group Un:Finish.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean
